Stop the mockery over Larnaca marina, says protestors

1 February 2026

Protestors gathered outside Larnaca marina on Saturday demanding an end to development delays. According to organizers, over 200 people attended the demonstration calling for immediate action on the stalled project.

The Larnaca marina development has been delayed for years, frustrating local businesses and residents who were promised improvements. Saturday's protest saw participants holding signs demanding accountability from local authorities.

"We've been waiting for too long," said Maria Georgiou, one of the organizers. "The marina could be a major tourist attraction, but instead it sits neglected."

Local authorities have promised to address the concerns but provided no specific timeline for resuming work on the marina project.
